filings.name: Declaratory Ruling on Upstream Transfer Transaction

Verified Joint Petition of Cogentrix Valcour Wind Energy Holdings, LLC, and AES Clean Energy Development, LLC, for a Declaratory Ruling That No Further Review is Required of Upstream Ownership Transfer, or in the Alternative, for Approval of the Proposed Transaction Pursuant to Section 70 of the Public Service Law.
